children.text: Currently Drank Alcohol(at least one drink of alcohol on at least 1 day during the 30 days before the survey)
Currently Used Marijuana(one or more times during the 30 days before the survey)
Drank Alcohol Before Age 13 Years(for the first time other than a few sips)

children.text: Ever Drank Alcohol(at least one drink of alcohol on at least 1 day during their life)

Did Not Have 8 Or More Hours Of Sleep(on an average school night)
